Oge Okoye (amuru na abali iri-na-isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba n’afọ 1980) bu onye actress  na Nigeria
A mụrụ Okoye na London,  ma mesịa ya ndị ezinụlọ ya kwaga na Lagos  Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nnamdi Azikiwe University, Awka  ma nweta nzere digiri Theatre Arts
N’afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye ihe nkiri African Movie Academy for “Best Actress maka nkwado ọrụ ya nakwa akparamagwa ya  n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ ''Eagle's Bride''
